children.text: Comprehensive JD Edwards solutions from implementation to innovation. Unlock your ERP’s full potential with our expert consulting, integration, and support services.

cards.description: Expert guidance to align JD Edwards with your business strategy. We help you assess, plan, and optimize your ERP environment to ensure it supports your operational goals and future growth.
cards.title: JD Edwards Consulting

cards.description: End-to-end operational management of your JD Edwards environment. Our proactive approach keeps your systems secure, stable, and performing at their best - 24/7.
cards.title: JD Edwards Managed Services

cards.description: Stay ahead with the latest JD Edwards features, performance improvements, and security updates. We make the upgrade process smooth, predictable, and disruption-free.
cards.title: JD Edwards Upgrade

cards.description: Seamless deployment of JD Edwards tailored to your industry and processes. We manage the entire project from requirements gathering to post-go-live support.
cards.title: JD Edwards Implementation

cards.description: Migrate your JD Edwards environment to the cloud with minimal risk. We help you plan, execute, and manage the transition to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure or hybrid models.
cards.title: Lift, Shift & Manage

cards.description: Automate and integrate business processes using JD Edwards Orchestrator. From routine tasks to complex workflows, we help you build smart, data-driven automations.
cards.title: JD Edwards Orchestrator

cards.description: Connect JD Edwards with other enterprise applications for seamless operations. We design and deploy integrations that eliminate silos and improve collaboration.
cards.title: JD Edwards Integrations

cards.description: Flexible, on-demand JD Edwards support when you need it. From quick fixes to process improvements, our experts are just a call away.
cards.title: Smart Help

service.description: End-to-end JD Edwards services from strategy and implementation to upgrades, integrations, and automation—maximizing value and minimizing risk at every stage of your ERP journey.
service.title: Complete JD Edwards Solution Partner

children.text: End-to-end Enterprise Performance Management solutions that streamline planning, budgeting, consolidation, reporting, and analytics—empowering your organization to make smarter, faster decisions.

cards.description: Design, implement, and optimize Oracle Planning & Budgeting solutions for more accurate forecasts and agile resource allocation.
cards.title: Planning and Budgeting

cards.description: Streamline your period-end close process and deliver timely, accurate consolidated financial statements with Oracle’s Financial Close solutions.
cards.title: Financial Close and Consolidation

cards.description: Automate and streamline reconciliation processes to improve accuracy, reduce risk, and accelerate financial close.
cards.title: Account Reconciliation

cards.description: Combine financial data with narrative context for transparent, compliant, and insightful reporting.
cards.title: Narrative and Regulatory Reporting

cards.description: Centralize, validate, and integrate financial and operational data to power accurate planning, reporting, and analytics.
cards.title: Data Management and Integration

service.description: From strategic planning to automated financial close, we deliver Oracle EPM solutions that help you align resources, manage performance, and report with confidence.
service.title: Performance Management Solutions for the Modern Enterprise

children.text: Comprehensive cloud ERP solutions with NetSuite, helping businesses streamline operations, improve financial visibility, and scale with confidence.

cards.description: End-to-end NetSuite deployment services to ensure your ERP is implemented on time, within budget, and aligned with your business goals.
cards.title: NetSuite Implementation

cards.description: Ongoing NetSuite support and tailored customization to meet your evolving business needs.
cards.title: Support and Customization

cards.description: Custom-built NetSuite solutions designed to address the unique challenges of your industry.
cards.title: Industry-Specific Solutions

cards.description: Enable your team to manage business processes and access critical data from any device, anywhere.
cards.title: NetSuite Mobile Access

cards.description: Enhance financial planning accuracy and streamline reconciliation processes with NetSuite’s integrated tools.
cards.title: Planning and Reconciliation

service.description: From implementation to industry-specific customization, our NetSuite services help you maximize your investment and drive sustainable business growth.
service.title: Cloud ERP Solutions That Grow With You

children.text: End-to-end cloud and infrastructure solutions that help you modernize IT, optimize performance, and scale securely across on-premise, hybrid, and multi-cloud environments.

cards.description: Expert guidance to design the right cloud roadmap tailored to your business requirements and long-term growth plans.
cards.title: Cloud Consulting and Strategy

cards.description: Seamless, secure migration of workloads, applications, and data to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure with minimal disruption.
cards.title: Migration to Oracle Cloud - OCI

cards.description: Proactive management and optimization of your on-premise, hybrid, or cloud infrastructure to ensure peak performance.
cards.title: Infrastructure Management

cards.description: Accelerate application delivery and improve operational efficiency through modern DevOps practices and automation tools.
cards.title: DevOps and Automation

cards.description: Design, implement, and manage multi-cloud strategies for flexibility, resilience, and vendor independence.
cards.title: Multi-Cloud Environments

service.description: From cloud strategy and migration to ongoing management, we deliver infrastructure solutions that align technology with your business goals.
service.title: Cloud Solutions Built for Agility and Performance

children.text: Comprehensive Oracle Database solutions from installation and optimization to backup, recovery, and autonomous database management, ensuring performance, reliability, and security.

cards.description: End-to-end Oracle Database installation and ongoing technical support to ensure smooth operations.
cards.title: Installation and Support

cards.description: Optimize database performance with tuning and fine-tuning techniques for queries, indexes, and configurations.
cards.title: Database Tuning

cards.description: Reliable backup and disaster recovery solutions to protect your critical data and ensure business continuity.
cards.title: Backup and Recovery

cards.description: Deploy Oracle’s self-driving, self-securing, and self-repairing Autonomous Database for reduced administration effort and enhanced performance.
cards.title: Oracle Autonomous DB

cards.description: Comprehensive database health checks to identify and fix performance, security, and stability issues.
cards.title: Health Check and Optimization

service.description: From setup to optimization and autonomous management, we deliver Oracle Database services that keep your data environment running at peak performance.
service.title: Secure, Optimized, and Always Available

children.text: Empower your workforce and customers with secure, scalable, and high-performance mobile solutions that connect business processes and data anywhere, anytime.

cards.description: Custom mobile applications designed to meet your unique business needs and deliver seamless user experiences.
cards.title: Mobile App Development

cards.description: Extend ERP capabilities to mobile devices for on-the-go access to JD Edwards and NetSuite functions.
cards.title: JD Edwards and NetSuite Mobile Apps

cards.description: Empower field teams with mobile tools for service delivery, work order management, and real-time updates.
cards.title: Field Service Mobility

cards.description: Upgrade and integrate legacy mobile applications with modern technologies and business systems.
cards.title: App Modernization and Integration

service.description: From developing custom mobile apps to integrating ERP capabilities on the go, we deliver solutions that extend your business beyond the desktop.
service.title: Mobile Solutions Designed for Business Impact

children.text: Unlock the power of your data with Oracle Business Intelligence solutions that deliver actionable insights through advanced analytics, visualization, and reporting.

cards.description: Leverage the power of Oracle’s cloud-based analytics platform for advanced data analysis and visualization.
cards.title: Oracle Analytics Cloud - OAC

cards.description: Design, deploy, and manage pixel-perfect reports and enterprise dashboards using BI Publisher and OBIEE.
cards.title: BI Publisher and OBIEE Reports

cards.description: Create interactive dashboards and visual analytics to make complex data easy to understand and act on.
cards.title: Data Visualization and Dashboards

cards.description: Empower business users to access, analyze, and visualize data without relying on IT.
cards.title: Self-Service BI

service.description: From analytics cloud setup to interactive dashboards, we deliver Oracle BI solutions that help you see, understand, and act on your data.
service.title: Data-Driven Insights for Smarter Decisions
